unnormalised: Hey, does anyone know the current USD to INR rate? Planning a trip to the US next month & need to exchange around $500. My travel agent quoted ₹83.50 per dollar, but I wanna check if I can get a better rate at Thomas Cook or some local forex dealer. Last time, I got ripped off with a rate of ₹78 against $1. Need to convert on or around 15/07/2024. Any suggestions, bhai?
normalised: Hey, does anyone know the current U-S-D to I-N-R rate? Planning a trip to the U-S next month and need to exchange around dollar five hundred. My travel agent quoted rupee eighty three point five zero per dollar, but I wanna check if I can get a better rate at Thomas Cook or some local forex dealer. Last time, I got ripped off with a rate of rupee seventy eight against dollar one. Need to convert on or around fifteenth July two thousand and twenty four. Any suggestions, bhai?
